price: 108. Ha isdhex taagin (hana ku tukan masjidkaa oo kale) waligaa. Masjid32 aasaaskiisa lagu dhisay taqwo maalintii ugu horreysayba baa mudan inaad dhex joogsato (si aad ugu tukato). Waxaa jooga rag jecel inay isdaahiriyaan. Allena wuu jecel yahay kuwa is-daahiriya (iska daahiriya shirkiga,  xumaha iyo najaasada).
arabic: لَا تَقُمۡ فِيهِ أَبَدٗاۚ لَّمَسۡجِدٌ أُسِّسَ عَلَى ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ مِنۡ أَوَّلِ يَوۡمٍ أَحَقُّ أَن تَقُومَ فِيهِۚ فِيهِ رِجَالٞ يُحِبُّونَ أَن يَتَطَهَّرُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُطَّهِّرِينَ
footnotes: 32. Masjidka halkan lagu tilmaamayo waa masjidka Qubaa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā taqum fīhi abadan lamasjidun ussisa ʿalā al-taqwā min awwali yawmin aḥaqqu an taqūma fīhi fīhi rijālun yuḥibbūna an yataṭahharū wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muṭahirīna
